titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 3579) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1998, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-505, by Mr. Solomon.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 3579. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read when called up for consideration.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 174.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/30/1998--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 3579 (emergency supplemental appropriations).
